name: pieceForSmartphoneOrchestra
description: A sound piece for smartphone orchestra.

scripts.create-icons-dir: if [ ! -d public/icons ]; then mkdir public/icons; fi
scripts.make-pdf-icon: if [ ! -f tikz/pieceForSmartphoneOrchestraIcon.pdf ]; then xelatex --output-directory=./tikz tikz/pieceForSmartphoneOrchestraIcon; fi
scripts.premake-png-icons: npm run make-pdf-icon && pdftoppm -r 720 -png -singlefile tikz/pieceForSmartphoneOrchestraIcon.pdf tikz/pieceForSmartphoneOrchestraIcon
scripts.make-png-icons: if [ ! -f public/icons/smartphoneOrchestraIcon-*.png ]; then for size in 32 48 72 96 144 192 256 384 512; do ffmpeg -i tikz/pieceForSmartphoneOrchestraIcon.png -vf scale=${size}:-1 public/icons/smartphoneOrchestra_${size}x${size}.png; done; fi
scripts.build: npm run create-icons-dir && npm run make-png-icons && astro build

author: Tassos Tsesmetzis
